text: Konege avara palige guptavagidda avara guptangagalu avara (parasparara) munde prakatavagalendu saitananu avaribbara manadalli sansayavannu bittidanu. ‘‘Nim'ma odeyanu a maradinda nim'mibbarannu tadediruvudu nivibbaru malak‌galagabaradu athava ciranjivigalagi bidabaradu emba karanakkagi matra’’ endu avanu (avarodane) helidanu
